/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
